meanings.definition: The direction toward which Muslims turn to pray, especially the Kaaba in Mecca.
meanings.sent1: Muslims always face the qiblas when they pray.
meanings.sent2: The mosque had clear markings showing the qiblas.
meanings.sent3: During the treasure hunt, they mistakenly followed the qiblas instead of the map.
meanings.sent4: Her heart pointed towards him like a magnetic qiblas.
meanings.sent5: The qiblas acted as a spiritual compass guiding their prayers.
